column5: The camp we've stayed at for the last 8 yrs has closed sadly closed down. We've got an eye on a resort not far from our old one for next summer that is an option. We usually stay for 8 or 10 nights. This summer our work schedule has opened up so we are looking to stay for at least 2 weeks. We previously stayed in housekeeping camp with our boat so we require very little. I would like to find a private cabin to rent to save $$$. At least until we can find another camp we are comfortable with. With the wife and I and two boys, the cheaper the cabin, the longer we can stay. If anyone has any ideas or info, please contact me. Usually stay in Nestor Falls, but, open to change. Thanks, Slushfish

Thanks Bigdaddy, We have checked out VRBO but very few of those listings are actually on LOTW. Most are near Kenora. We would consider that for the right price. Would like to find a place in Sabaskong. Thanks again, I'll keep an eye on it.

http://lowdpoa.com/These folks publish a monthly magazine which has a classified section which includes LOTW rentals. Send them an email and they should be able to let you know what's listed. If they won't, send me a pm and I will scan and send to you.

I'm hoping to have some guest accommodation at my place on LOTW this summer.I'm about 8 miles south of Kenora by boat.Don't know if it will be ready by the time you travel.Depends on how things go this winter.
Are you close to witchbay? Or where is your place close to? Thanks

I am on the north end of Wolf Island.https://www.google.ca/maps/@49.6795874,-94.5164853,14zI have some lots for sale and have started developing to build accommodations for guests and seasonal rentals.
do you have any info on the rates or lots?
